creditline: The Christina N. and Swan J. Turnblad Memorial Fund
description: tie-dyed dark blue ground with yellow horizontal stripes and light blue radiating ripple-like design; short twisted fringe on short ends
dimension: 42 3/4 x 58 in. (108.59 x 147.32 cm) (irregular, without fringe)
markings: \'C么te d\'Ivore/bought & made/in 1999 3.\', in black ink, on front of tag, tied to corner of fringe; \'Katayua/from Gambia/ s/p oum\'e\', in black ink, on back of tag
title: Woman's wrapper
